title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 May 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (15/05/2008 09:42): Design.DefaultWikiImprovements was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ShivaShankar (Added change font in Nicer UI) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/DefaultWikiImprovements  
vanksi - (15/05/2008 12:13): i have a strange problem, when i login i get redirected to "view: Main" and it's empty should't i get redirected to "Main: Home" by default?  
vmassol - (15/05/2008 12:16): hi vanksi, by default the login will redirect you to the page that asked for authentication  
vmassol - (15/05/2008 12:16): so for ex, if you ask for Space.Page and it needs authentication, it'll call the login page  
vmassol - (15/05/2008 12:16): and then when logged in, you'll be redirected to Space.Page  
evely\_24 - (15/05/2008 14:12): Hi, we need your votes on the new Administration proposal on devs list. Please vote asap :)

rrodriguez - (15/05/2008 23:56): please, I've just send a message to devs list about this, but perhaps somebody here could help me on this: I do need to have a minimum control over the appearance of the RTF export layout.  
rrodriguez - (15/05/2008 23:57): Could anybody point me in the right direction? Thanks!
